# factsetR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`factsetR` provides functions for accessing [FactSet's APIs](https://developer.factset.com/api-catalog) that return objects that are amenable to analysis using the tidy data infrastructure (i.e. the `tidyverse`, `tidyverts`, `tidymodels`, etc).

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("chris-lundberg/factsetr")
```
